name: Cat Run (itch) (ishaqadhel)
description:
Cat Run is the perfect game for you to play with while waiting to spend your
free time while taking a break from the busy life. Especially since the COVID-19
pandemic, people are searching for something to relieve their stress. Cat Run is an
endless loop game where you play as a cat named Sir Robert. Sir Robert loves to
wonder carelessly through the vast wilderness of his owner's backyard. so your job
is to guide Sir Robert to make sure no harm will happen to him.
